cards.rules_text:
When Grasp of the Mycocyst enters the battlefield, create a token that's a copy of target creature you control, except it's a Fungus in addition to its other types.
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Grasp of the Mycocyst.
When Infected Wretch has two or more spore counters on it, remove them and transform it.
cards.rules_text2:
Whenever you cast a Fungus spell, copy it. [i](A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)[/i]
Whenever another permanent you control transforms into a Fungus, create a token that's a copy of it.

cards.rules_text:
When Baun's Apex enters the battlefield, if it was cast, choose target nonland permanent an opponent controls. That permanent's owner shuffles it into their library. 
When Baun's Apex dies, return it to the battlefield transformed.
cards.rules_text2:
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you may shuffle it and Grafted Progress into their owner's libraries. If you do, take an extra turn after this one.
Equip {2}{W}{U}

cards.rules_text:
Creature spells you cast can't be countered.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may search your library for a creature card with lesser mana value, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Do this only once each turn.

When Molecular Overdrive enters the battlefield, each player loses 3 life and creates a 2/2 black and green Human Mutant creature token.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player loses 3 life unless they control a Mutant. Then if no Mutants are on the battlefield, sacrifice Molecular Overdrive.

Menace
Whenever a creature you control enters the battlefield or attacks, if its power is 4 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on Necrobutcher. Then if Necrobutcher's power is 10 or greater, each opponent discards their hand.

Whenever you cast a spell, you get {V} [i](a gene counter)[/i].
Pay {V}{V}: Choose a counter on a permanent you control. Put a counter of that kind on target permanent you control if it doesn't have a counter of that kind on it. Activate only as a sorcery.

[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it.)[/i]
When Heavy Metal War enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent.
When Heavy Metal War is defeated, you may put the exiled card onto the battlefield under your control.

Pulsating Growth enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {C}. You may put a spore counter on Pulsating Growth.
When Pulsating Growth has two or more spore counters on it, remove them and transform it.
cards.rules_text2:
Vigilance, menace
{T}: Add {C}.
cards.flavor_text2: [i]The meager and irradiated earth of Skand now teems with mycocystic life.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever a creature you control enters the battlefield or dies, you may put a refuge counter on Partisan Hideout.
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}, {T}, Exile Partisan Hideout: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value equal to the number of refuge counters on Partisan Hideout.

As Genomic Blueprint enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name.
Triggered abilities of sources with the chosen name don't trigger.

As Advanced Genomics enters the battlefield, choose two creature types.
Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each of the chosen types they are.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Kuth Von's hypergenetics labs plunge deeper into the mysteries of DNA, losing track of what keeps them human.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flash
Flying
Final Sequence enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other spell cast this turn.
Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, draw a card, then you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Spores and threads reach unseen through the complex, spreading growth from a mote to a mountain.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flash
Flying, trample
When Draconic Mockery enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature. When you do, Draconic Mockery deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.
Destroy target nonland, nonartifact permanent. You lose life equal to that permanent's mana value.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“From embryo to enclosure—cell to cell—life on this plane is mine to shape.”
—Kuth Von, gene tyrant[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Transit Chamber enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a basic Plains.
{T}: Add {W}.
{W}, Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: Until end of turn, Transit Chamber becomes a 2/3 white Horror creature with flying. It's still a land.

Observation Chamber enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a basic Island.
{T}: Add {U}.
{U}, Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: Until end of turn, Observation Chamber becomes a 4/4 blue Horror creature with vigilance. It's still a land.

Mortuary Chamber enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a basic Swamp.
{T}: Add {B}.
{B}, Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: Until end of turn, Mortuary Chamber becomes a 3/3 black Horror creature with menace. It's still a land.

Fusion Chamber enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a basic Mountain.
{T}: Add {R}.
{R}, Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: Until end of turn, Synthesis Chamber becomes a 2/2 red Horror creature with double strike. It's still a land.

Synthesis Chamber enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a basic Forest.
{T}: Add {G}.
{G}, Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: Until end of turn, Synthesis Chamber becomes a 5/4 green Horror creature with trample. It's still a land.

When Spinal Engineer dies, return it to the battlefield transformed.

cards.flavor_text: [i]Sometimes escaping death on Skand is a matter of outrunning another survivor. But with fungal infections and retroviral plagues, it's impossible to outrun your own blood.[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]Above ground, little survives. The air itself rejects every breath. Still, there are some who brave its scoured hell for fear for the alternative.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Destroy target enchantment or land.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Aleph is not the only major laboratory within the Starlight complex. The Gamal labs were lost to a meltdown that brought about an agreement to abandon nuclear experiments, while the Dalat wing is a mystery few dare to investigate.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Target creature gets -100/-100 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text:

cards.rules_text:
{W}{U} BIONICS Progress is grafted. Use equipment and the creatures that leave them behind on death to succeed.
{U}{B} AUGMENT Splice ungodly abominations together to prevail.
{B}{R} FEROCIOUS Power 4 or greater is the key to victory.
{R}{G} SPORES Your Fungi and spore counters will spread their blessings.
{G}{W} LIFEGAIN Vitality is the name of the game.
{W}{B} ATTRITION Your test subjects are expendable. Churn through them on your path to glory.
{B}{G} AUGMENT Unwilling hosts will become your greatest monsters.
{G}{U} AUGMENT Think big. Bigger. No, even bigger.
{U}{R} UNSTABLE Gene counters will breed the man of tomorrow.
{R}{W} UNSTABLE Attack aggressively, as your creatures use gene counters to out-compete your opponent.
